data.name: Southern Data Science Conference
data.description: Southern Data Science is a special data science R&D conference that brings experts and researchers from the top data science companies and institutes to present their work and share their best practices in data science.

relatedRecords.name: Druid Summit 2020
relatedRecords.description: Druid is an emerging standard in the data infrastructure world, designed for high-performance slice-and-dice analytics (“OLAP”-style) on large data sets. This talk is for you if you’re interested in learning more about pushing Druid’s analytical performance to the limit. Perhaps you’re already ru…
